Dayton Superior – Sure Fil J52 Joint Filler

Sure Fil J52 is a 100% solids, two component, low shrink, moisture tolerant joint filler and crack repair material. Sure Fil J52 is used to fill joints in industrial floors exposed to hard wheeled traffic. Sure Fil J52 is useful for control joints that are cut or formed. Sure Fil J52 may also be used for the repair of damaged or spalled cracks.

• Pourable consistency
• V.O.C. compliant
• 1:1 mix ratio
• Self-priming
• Moisture insensitive
• Allows moderate joint movement
• Does not weld slab joints together
• Does not embrittle with age
• Meets U.S.D.A. requirements for incidental food contact

Weight 576 oz
Dimensions 7 x 17.5 x 11.5 in
Product Type

22-oz cartridge
Product Color

Gray
Product Size

12 Pack Carton
